column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We came late on a Sunday afternoon and had no trouble at all finding a table.  The brioche was heavenly...light and flaky
column2: just slightly sweet and a little more sweet with the sugar sprinkles on top.  Not  as many places make brioche compared to croissants
column3: so it was a treat to find these freshly made ones.
